fullgame.name: Where Is My Parking Spot - Parking Reimagined

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.

name: Where Is My Parking Spot - Parking Reimagined Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.
